results.title: Subway All Services - Part Suspended
results.snippet: Due to planned engineering works, the entire subway network will operate with reduced service between 10:00 and 14:00. Expect longer waiting times.

results.title: Outer Circle - Normal Service Resumed
results.snippet: Following earlier disruption, the Outer Circle is now running normally. Thank you for your patience.

results.title: Train Service Update - First ScotRail
results.snippet: First ScotRail services between Glasgow Central and Edinburgh are experiencing minor delays.

results.title: Subway Closure Notice - New Year's Day
results.snippet: Please note that Glasgow Subway will be closed all day on 1st January for the public holiday. Normal service resumes 2nd January.
